Summon Commander:#2637 Ahurani
The Ahuranis are Yazatas of waters, rains, prosperity and health. They were once companions of the great Ahura of the Waters, but when he was banished from this world, they fled creation. Their presence will bring rainfall and they can cure diseases and bring their subjects with them beneath the waves.
